TEXT.TITLE: SINGAPORE LAND LTD <LNDH.SI> FIRST HALF FEB 28
TEXT.BODY: Shr 8.43 cts vs 9.61 cts Int div nil vs nil Group net 7.8 mln dlrs vs 8.9 mln Turnover 30.6 mln dlrs vs 33.5 mln Note - The company said group net profits for the year ending this Aug 31 should amount to 13.5 mln dlrs. REUTER
